name: Invincible Beasts and Where to Hide from Them
name_original: Invincible Beasts and Where to Hide from Them
description:
Waaaaaay back when, I had a disc with some freeware/software games.

One of these files was beast.com , a nifty little ascii game. Never been able to find it again.

You squished most enemies with blocks, another enemy type could push blocks....and I soon learned that a custom game with 60(max) TYPE 3 enemies was unwinnable. These enemies were invincible and you had to trap them to make them explode into Type 1 enemies. But when there were this many, you instead had to trap yourself...and eventually they started blowing up your walls.

And so a love affair of playing games in unintended ways began...

Weekly Game Jam Entry - Week 157 - Vulnerable Invincible
Code by myself
Music/SFX by lecastro
